mapper.select:
select
,
from customer_info c WHERE c.is_deleted = 0
and c.telephonenumber like CONCAT('%',${telephonenumber},'%' )

select
,
from customer_info c WHERE c.is_deleted = 0
AND c.telephonenumber = #{telephonenumber}
select customer_source from customer_info where is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY customer_source
